title: China Pharma R user group meeting 2025
text:
3rd China Pharmaceutical Industry R User Group Meeting will be held on March 28, 2025, both on-site and online. On-site meeting locations: Shanghai (Novartis campus), Beijing (Sanofi campus).
第二届中国医药行业R用户大会将于2024年3月29日召开。线上线下同步进行。线下会议地点：上海（诺华园区），北京（赛诺菲园区）。



Key dates





13-Dec-2024
Call for Papers Opens


31-Jan-2025
Call for Papers Closes


1-Feb-2025 to 7-Feb-2025
Acceptance Notices Sent to Authors


3-Feb-2025
Conference Registration Opens


7-Mar-2025
Conference Registration Closes


21-Mar-2025
Final Papers/Slides Due


28-Mar-2025
China Pharma R User Group meeting



Conference organising committee: Baoqing Li (Johnson & Johnson), Fan Zhang (Sanofi) and Joe Zhu (Roche)
